name: HYPER SUPER MONCHI RANCH DS
description:
MEET MONCHIES AND EGGIES!!

those adorable creatures are the face of this DS inspired clicker and incremental game.

Play with 6 colored Monchies an 3 Differents eggies in 3 stages.

A love letter to the Nintendo DS. 

You can buy 5 power-ups with in-game currency in order to advance ultra quick and discover all of the Monchies!!

CHANGELOG

v. 1.1: 

- Bugs fixed

- Scale updated
